mod_def.name: medio-central
mod_def.modDescr: Medial of middle of body part

mod_def.name: latero-central
mod_def.modDescr: Lateral of middle of body part

mod_def.name: angle_0
mod_def.modDescr: The default base angle position in a circular or other annular system

mod_def.name: angle_90
mod_def.modDescr: An angle 1/4 turn CW from the base angle position in a circular or other annular system

mod_def.name: angle_180
mod_def.modDescr: The postion opposite of the base angle position in a circular or other annular system

mod_def.name: angle_270
mod_def.modDescr: The position 3/4 turn CW or 1/4 turn CCW from default base angle position in a circular or other annular system

mod_def.name: angle_
mod_def.modDescr: A position at an arbitrary angle from default base angle position in a circular or other annular system. The angle is to be appended following the underscore
